title: Rulo Ezberbozan Lezzetler
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Western, Buffet, Fast food, Salad bar, Take-out, Middle Eastern, Turkish
description: A sandwich and wrap shop with a buffet that offers Turkish dishes and salads made of vegetables and legumes. Choose what you'd like in your wrap--including chickpeas, eggplant, bean, wheat and lentil salads, cig kofte, baked potatoes, chips, carrot, and red cabbage salads with hummus and muhammara. Lunch starts 12pm.
streetAddress: Caferaga Mahallesi Nailbey Sokak, Unit 15, Kadikoy
